title: Bensel & Gretels
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Indian, International, Italian, Macrobiotic, Organic, Buffet, Mediterranean, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Asian, Bakery, Catering, French, Fusion, German, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-run bistro with a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Vegan choices include a burrito, daily soups and stews (with the exception of an occasional fish soup, tofu bolognese, anti-pasti bagels, chocolate-cherry cake and made-in-house chutneys and marmalades. Has many gluten free items. Serves fair trade/bio coffee with soy milk. Eco-friendly restaurant including the take-away packaging.
